verses.roman:
haridāsa kailā prabhura caraṇa vandana
haridāse kailā prabhu prema-āliṅgana

synonyms: haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; kailā—did; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇa vandana—worshiping the lotus feet; haridāse—unto Haridāsa; kailā—did; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prema-āliṅgana—embracing in ecstatic love.
translation: Haridāsa Ṭhākura offered obeisances to the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and the Lord embraced him in ecstatic love.
